entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned in the title '102 H ARRY POTTER'.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, described as having cold and empty eyes.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as having warmth in his eyes.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as having the gift of keeping a class silent without effort.

relationships.description: Snape's eyes are described as cold and empty, unlike Hagrid's warm eyes.
Both Snape and Professor McGonagall have the gift of keeping a class silent without effort.
